TextView.android:text: This application is for persons of marriageable age 18 and above, single, widow, annulled for Filipino & divorce for foreigner.
Marriageable age 18 & above, single, widowed, annulled (For Filipino Citizens) and Divorced (For Foreigners)
1. Barangay Treasurer or Municipal Treasurer’s Office
2. COLB of the applicants (Original copy & 1 photocopy)
2. Philippine Statistics Authority or Mun. Civil Registry Office
3. Commanding Officer (For Military/PNP)\n*Embassy of Foreign Countries (For Foreigners)
- For military issued by the CO (1 Original copy)
- For Foreigner issued by the Embassy (1 Original copy)
4. Philippine Statistics Authority or Municipal Civil Registry Office\n*Attorney
- Certificate of Death of deceased spouse (Original copy & 1 photocopy each)
- Affidavit that applicant has never been married after the death of spouse (optional) (1 Original copy)
5. Parents / Guardian with CTC (1 Original copy)
5. Barangay Treasurer or Municipal Treasurer’s Office
- For the release of marriage license:
2. Tree Growing Certificate (both applicant) (1 Original copy)
4. Philippine Statistics Authority or Mun. Civil Registry Office
1. Submit Application for Marriage License requirements to Receiving Clerk

1.1. Receive and Verifies




1.2. Prepares the Application for Marriage License
2. Review & sign Application for Marriage License & other supporting documents
2.1. Let the applicants and parents review, sign Application for Marriage License & other supporting documents
3. Proceed to Municipal Civil Registrar for interview

3.1. Interview the applicants.


3.2. Advice for the release of Marriage License
5. Present the Official Receipt & receive the owner’s copy

5.1. Segregate the AML

5.2. File the records

5.3. Give the owner’s copy

5.4. Instruct the client to come back after 10 days
6. Return after 10 days to get/claim marriage license
6.1. Prepare Marriage license & see to it requirements are complied
8. Accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) and drop it in the feedback box
8.1. Request client to accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) form in the feedback box
